configAllowErrorReportingDesc: If you notice broken behaviour in the plugin, please activate this before creating an issue on Github. It will make finding a solution easier.
configAllowEditingDesc: (Experimental) Allow editing of the page properties in the attribute panel. This requires SiYuan version 3.0.17
configShowBuiltInPropertiesDesc: Show built-in properties always in the attribute panel
configShowEmptyPropertiesDesc: Use to hide properties that have no value in the panel.
configShowPrimaryKeyDesc: Show primary key in the attribute panel, which is usually the same as the page title.
configShowDatabasePropertiesDesc: Show database properties always in the attribute panel
configUseMultipleTableLayoutDesc: Decide how multiple databases are displayed in the panel.
configAlignPropertiesLeftDesc: Align property rows to the left with a custom margin.
configShowBottomSeparatorDesc: Display a horizontal line at the bottom of the properties panel.
columnVisibilityOrphanedWarning: This database is no longer visible in any document.
debugLogsDesc: Last {count} log entries from the plugin. These logs help diagnose issues, especially on mobile devices where console access is limited.
configEnableDebugLoggingDesc: Show the debug log viewer in settings. Share these logs in bug reports to help diagnose issues.
